text: The Granite Tower is an English language magazine published eight times a year at the start of each semester month by Korea University.Newspapers. KU Story. Korea JoongAng Daily, July 26, 2006. Retrieved April 11, 2017. ==History== The Granite Tower was started by Min Yong-bin, and the first newspaper edition was in September 1954. In 1968, the newspaper was re-established by Park Ik-seo. The Granite Tower became a magazine in 1993 and went online in 1997. The Granite Tower is one of the oldest English language magazine in South Korean universities About Us, The Granite Tower (2017).
